DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of this study are to assess the safety of NAB001 for topical treatment of mild to moderate distal onychomycosis of the toenails over 52 weeks and to compare the efficacy of NAB001 to vehicle alone at the end of the study (Week 56) after treating for 52 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Safety & Efficacy of NAB001 in the Treatment of Mild to Moderate Onychomycosis of the Toenails
DOC.criteria: mild to moderate fungal infection of the toenail as assessed by study doctor koh positive & dermatophyte culture positive at Visit 1 good general health as assessed by the study doctor severe fungal toenail infection prior use of antifungal drugs (washout allowed, duration varies on class) significant confounding conditions as assessed by study doctor pregnancy/lactation must forego nail salon procedures during study for at least ~60 weeks
